description: This is an SNMP notification of a change to an existing
feature activation on an endpoint. Data in the

event.Summary: Activation key status change frm $v1 to $v2

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD IBM-FEATURE-ACTIVATION-MIB::ibmFodActivationChangeAlert IBM-FEATURE-ACTIVATION-MIB::ibmFodIndex i 1 IBM-FEATURE-ACTIVATION-MIB::ibmFodKeyChangeTime s EXAMPLEE IBM-FEATURE-ACTIVATION-MIB::ibmFodKeyOldStatus i 1 IBM-FEATURE-ACTIVATION-MIB::ibmFodKeyNewStatus i 1 IBM-FEATURE-ACTIVATION-MIB::ibmFodKeyUpdateData s EXAMPLE

description: Activation key index to uninstall or export.
This is only required for uninstall and export actions.
This is also used to identify the key associated with alerts.
variables.name: IBM-FEATURE-ACTIVATION-MIB::ibmFodIndex

description: The date and time of the event described in
this notification of activated function status change.
variables.name: IBM-FEATURE-ACTIVATION-MIB::ibmFodKeyChangeTime

description: The prior status of the activation key associated
variables.name: IBM-FEATURE-ACTIVATION-MIB::ibmFodKeyOldStatus

description: The new status of the activation key associated
variables.name: IBM-FEATURE-ACTIVATION-MIB::ibmFodKeyNewStatus

description: String containing constraint data. This is only used
for ibmFodNewStatus value of keyReplaced (10). Otherwise
variables.name: IBM-FEATURE-ACTIVATION-MIB::ibmFodKeyUpdateData
